title: Train fault near Somerset station causing delays

updates.text: Train services between Marina Bay and Newton have resumed. bus bridging svcs and bus svcs between these stations are still available.
Trains are travelling slower from Marina Bay to Bishan north bound due to an earlier train fault.
The train service has resumed. We apologize for the delay.
There is no trn svc from Marina Bay to Newton, paxs traveling to Bishan and Woodlands Line, please transfer at BuonaVista and PayaLebar.
Update: There is no train service from Marina Bay to Newton north bound.
Due to train fault at Somerset station, free bus and free bus bridging service is available between Marina Bay and Newton both bounds.
Due to a train fault near Somerset station, please expect additional 25mins from Marina Bay to Newton both bounds.
